name: Amenorrhea
tagline: Amenorrhea is associated with complications during menstrual bleeding. Treatment for it may be associated with the cause and should be recommended by a doctor.

name: Anemia
tagline: A deficiency in red blood cells or haemoglobin results in weakness in the body, known as anaemia. Treatment will depend on underlying diagnosis by a doctor.

name: Anti Allergic
tagline: From antihistamines to creams, we provide medicines to treat different kinds of allergic reactions.

name: Antibiotics
tagline: Antibiotics are the most important agent for fighting off dangerous bacterial infections. Our products cover a wide range of medications for treating and preventing such infections.

name: Antiworms
tagline: Mivaan medication provides solutions and prevention from infections caused by worms.

name: Blood Pressure Management
tagline: Hypertension can lead to heart failure, strokes and kidney diseases. Our goal is to protect significant organs from severe damage.

name: Blood Suger Management
tagline: Mivaan’s medication works towards stabilising blood glucose levels in a healthy range which is essential especially for diabetic patients.

name: Calcium
tagline: Calcium supplements are a necessary addition to one’s dietary supply to maintain healthy bone growth.

name: Cough managment
tagline: The early diagnosis and treatment of cough should be given consideration and can essentially prevent a frustrating condition.

name: Depression Management
tagline: Depression is generally overlooked by most however it can interfere with your daily functioning and must be treated.

name: Digestive Enzyme
tagline: Digestive enzymes are an essential part of preventing digestive malfunctions and similar ailments.

name: Gastroenterology Management
tagline: Our range of medications provide treatment and relief from disorders pertaining to the stomach and intestines.

name: Insomnia
tagline: Based on diagnosis, insomnia can be cured by non-medical therapy, however, medication is an effective form of treatment.

name: Pain Killers
tagline: Mivaan’s range of painkillers are suitable for a diverse range of ailments and are used to lessen and provide relief from pain.

name: Sexual Stimulation
tagline: Medication for sexual performance can be prescribed for treating erectile dysfunction and impotence.
